title: 5.2.12.1.8.1 Telemetry Host-Initiated LID Specific Parameter Field

content.text:
Figure 219 specifies the format for the LID Specific Parameter field in the Supported Log Pages log page
(refer to section 5.2.12.1.1) for the Telemetry Host-Initiated log page.

tables.title: Table_5_2_12_1_8_1_Telemetry_Host_Initiated_LID_Specific_Parameter_Field
tables.table_md:
| Bits | Description |
| :--- | :--- |
| 15:1 | Reserved |
| 0 | Maximum Created Data Area Support (MCDAS): If this bit is set to '1', then the controller supports the Maximum Created Data Area field in Log Specific Parameter field for a Telemetry Host-Initiated log page. If this bit is cleared to '0', then the controller does not support the Maximum Created Data Area field in Log Specific Parameter field for a Telemetry Host-Initiated log page. |
